titleStmt.title: Auden Musulin Papers: A Digital Edition of W. H. Auden´s Letters to Stella Musulin (FWF P 33754)
Photographs [?] of W. H. Auden, Chester Kallman, and Elsa Musulin [1960]

publicationStmt.publisher: Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

availability.p: Copyright literary texts W. H. Auden Estate of W. H. Auden.

seriesStmt.p: Machine-Readable Transcriptions of the Auden Musulin Papers

div.p: Top right: Private photograph of W. H. Auden (left) and Elsa Musulin (right), Fridau, Ober-Grafendorf, ca. 1960. Wystan Auden

Bottom left: Private photograph of W. H. Auden (left), Elsa Musulin (middle), and Chester Kallman (right), Fridau, Ober-Grafendorf, ca. 1960.
W.H.A. Mama, Chester Kalmann.
Bottom right: Private photograph of Elsa Musulin (left) and W. H. Auden (right), Fridau, Ober-Grafendorf, ca. 1960.
Top left: Private photograph of Marga Tacoli (left), Gherardo Tacoli (middle), and Alexander Tacoli, Fridau, Ober-Grafendorf, November 1960.
Top right: Private photograph of Elsa Musulin (left), Alexander Tacoli (middle), Gherardo Tacoli (right, back), Marga Tacoli (right, front), Fridau, Ober-Grafendorf, November 1960.
Bottom: Private photograph of Marga Tacoli (back) and Alexander Tacoli (front), Fridau, Ober-Grafendorf, November 1960.
